data.title: TCM Classic Film Festival 2024
data.meta_description: Join us for the 15th Annual TCM Classic Film Festival on April 18-21, 2024. TCM invites you and the usual suspects to the big movie house for Most Wanted: Crime and Justice in Film.
data.text:
George Clooney speaks onstage at the screening of OCEAN’S ELEVEN in 2023.

Michael Allin, RZA, and Jacqueline Stewart speak onstage at the screening for ENTER THE DRAGON (1973) in 2023.

Lou Diamond Phillips and Edward James Olmos attend a screening of STAND AND DELIVER (1988) at the Hollywood Legion Theater in 2023

Ann-Margret and Dave Karger speak onstage at the screening for BYE BYE BIRDIE (1963) in 2023.

Shari Belafonte, Ben Mankiewicz, Donald Bogle, Louis Gossett Jr., Debra Martin Chase, and Lawrence Hilton Jacobs attend the screening of CARMEN JONES (1954) in 2023.

Candy Clark and Richard Dreyfuss attend the screening of AMERICAN GRAFFITI in 2023.

Pam Grier speaks onstage at the screening of COFFY (1973) in 2022.

Steven Spielberg and Jane Seymour attend the 40th Anniversary Screening of E.T. THE EXTRA-TERRESTRIAL (1982) during opening night in 2022.

Ben Mankiewicz and Lori Petty in 2022.

Mink Stole and Mario Cantone attend the screening of POLYESTER (1981) in 2022.

Paul Reiser, Tim Daly, Kevin Bacon, Steve Guttenberg, and Dave Karger attend the screening of DINER (1982) in 2022.

Jane Seymour attends the 40th Anniversary Screening of E.T. THE EXTRA-TERRESTRIAL (1982) during opening night in 2022.

Rob Reiner, Meg Ryan, and Billy Crystal attend The 30th Anniversary Screening of WHEN HARRY MET SALLY (1989) in 2019.

Donald Bogle, Stephanie Allain, Molly Haskell and Jacqueline Stewart at “The Complicated Legacy of Gone With the Wind” panel in 2019.

John Carpenter, Dave Karger, and Kurt Russell attend the screening of ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK(1981) in 2019.

Joie Lee and Ruth E. Carter speak onstage at the screening of DO THE RIGHT THING (1989) in 2019.

Rita Moreno attends a book signing in 2016.

Illeana Douglas and Dick Cavett speak onstage in 2017.

Cicely Tyson places her handprints in the forecourt of the TCL Chinese IMAX Theatre in 2018.

“Live from the TCM Classic Film Festival: Michael Douglas” in 2017.

Anjelica Huston in 2010.

Francis Ford Coppola attends THE CONVERSATION (1974) screening in 2016.

Danny DeVito and Christopher Lloyd speak onstage at ONE FLEW OVER THE CUCKOO’S NEST (1975) in 2016.

Kim Novak in 2012.

Hayley Mills in 2012.

Eva Marie Saint in 2010.

Mel Brooks in 2012.

Robert Osborne and Debbie Reynolds in 2012.

Tippi Hedren in 2013.

Quincy Jones in 2014.

Richard Dreyfuss in 2014.

Shirley Jones in 2014.
